thread.title: Ground News - Marco Wilson excited about Patriots’ history developing cornerbacks

author: Boston Herald
title: Ground News - Marco Wilson excited about Patriots’ history developing cornerbacks
text:
Summary by Boston Herald FOXBORO — Bill Belichick’s reputation working with Patriots cornerbacks precedes him. Recently claimed cornerback Marco Wilson was excited to join the Patriots this week because of the team’s history at the position. The Patriots have earned players like Malcolm Butler, J.C. Jackson and Logan Ryan a lot of money in free agency by building them up through their defensive system. Related Articles New England Patriots | Patriots Christi… Share menu More
